meanings.definition: Making marks that cannot be removed.
meanings.sent1: The indelible ink left a permanent mark on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The artist used indelible markers to create a lasting design.
meanings.sent3: The indelible stain on his shirt made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her words left an indelible impression on his mind.
meanings.sent5: The indelible memory of that day stayed with him forever.

meanings.definition: Unable to be forgotten or removed.
meanings.sent1: The indelible image of the sunset stayed in her mind.
meanings.sent2: The impact of his speech was truly indelible.
meanings.sent3: The indelible smell of fresh cookies filled the room.
meanings.sent4: His kindness left an indelible mark on her heart.
meanings.sent5: The indelible bond between them was unbreakable.

meanings.sent1: The indelible memories of childhood bring a smile to her face.
meanings.sent2: The love they shared was truly indelible.
meanings.sent3: The indelible sunshine warmed their hearts.
meanings.sent4: His legacy left an indelible impact on the community.
meanings.sent5: The indelible beauty of the landscape took his breath away.
